1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Jeff Sanger is a drug smuggler who is eager to get out of his small border town. When his best friend and client, Alex, threatens to cut the cash flow in half, Jeff begs him for another chance. Reluctantly, Alex gives him a job for a new group of clients in the area. Little does Jeff know that this cargo can be much more dangerous than drugs.

2.title: The Tribe
2.plot: Annoyed with Crow's desire to settle down, Stag uses Lynx's addiction as a means to force them to hit the road again. Meanwhile, Jeff celebrates his sudden wealth when he is approached by the mysterious Holiday, who seems to possess a dark knowledge about the three women.

imdb.plot outline: Desperate to leave his small town of Nelson Lake, Jeff Sanger, a small time smuggler, unwittingly takes on a dangerous job transporting a blood like substance for a mysterious trio of women. Lucky to escape with his life, Jeff celebrates his sudden wealth at the local bar where he is approached by the mysterious Holiday, an ex-detective who seems to possess a morbid amount of information regarding the women. When Jeff suffers an unexpected loss, he must choose between helping Holiday with his vendetta or staying on the women's good side; unsure which is the lesser of the two evils.
imdb.title: Zero Avenue
plot: Desperate to leave his small town of Nelson Lake, Jeff Sanger, a small time smuggler, unwittingly takes on a dangerous job transporting a blood like substance for a mysterious trio of women. Lucky to escape with his life, Jeff celebrates his sudden wealth at the local bar where he is approached by the mysterious Holiday, an ex-detective who seems to possess a morbid amount of information regarding the women. When Jeff suffers an unexpected loss, he must choose between helping Holiday with his vendetta or staying on the women's good side; unsure which is the lesser of the two evils.::S. K. Hardilek
